content.original: The Extralight Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much lighter radiation shielding. The XL fusion engine is half the mass for the same performance. The Clan XL fusion engine is 66% larger than the standard fusion engine and intrudes into the side torso bays of a BattleMech.
content.prevOriginal: The Extralight Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much lighter radiation shielding. The XL fusion engine is half the mass for the same performance. The Clan XL fusion engine is 66% larger than the standard fusion engine and intrudes into the side torso bays of a BattleMech.
content.content: 超轻量化聚变引擎在机械结构上类似于标准聚变引擎,但使用了更轻的辐射屏蔽材料.超轻量化聚变引擎重量只有标准型的50%.氏族聚变引擎比标准型体积大了66%并且侵入了战斗机甲的两侧躯干.

content.original: The Clan Extra-Extralight Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much lighter radiation shielding. The cXXL fusion engine is one third the mass for the same performance, but extrudes into the side torsos of a Battlemech and produces additional waste heat.
content.prevOriginal: The Clan Extra-Extralight Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much lighter radiation shielding. The cXXL fusion engine is one third the mass for the same performance, but extrudes into the side torsos of a Battlemech and produces additional waste heat.
content.content: 氏族极端轻量化聚变引擎在机械结构上类似于标准聚变引擎,但使用了更轻的辐射屏蔽材料.轻量化聚变引擎重量只有标准型的三分之一,但是侵入了战斗机甲的两侧躯干并且产生额外的废热.

content.original: Early Clan ballistic weapons tech also benefited from advanced metallurgy and construction techniques that rendered these classics of warfare lighter and more compact. Firing bursts of smaller Caliber have Clan Engineers managed to enable it firing a reliable Rapid Fire too. Uses AC10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Early Clan ballistic weapons tech also benefited from advanced metallurgy and construction techniques that rendered these classics of warfare lighter and more compact. Firing bursts of smaller Caliber have Clan Engineers managed to enable it firing a reliable Rapid Fire too. Uses AC10 Ammo.
content.content: 早期的氏族弹道武器得益于先进的冶金和构造技术,使这些经典的战争武器变的更轻、更紧凑.使用小口径武器射击让氏族工程师也能够可靠的快速开火. 使用AC10弹药.

content.original: Early Clan prototypes of the LB-X also underwent testing during Operation KLONDIKE. Though a little less effective and a little more bulky than their modern Inner Sphere-made equivalents, these autocannons paved the way for what became known as the Clan standard. Uses LBX10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Early Clan prototypes of the LB-X also underwent testing during Operation KLONDIKE. Though a little less effective and a little more bulky than their modern Inner Sphere-made equivalents, these autocannons paved the way for what became known as the Clan standard. Uses LBX10 Ammo.
content.content: LB-X的早期氏族原型也在克朗代克行动期间进行了测试.虽然其与现代内天体制造的同类产品相比,其效率稍低,体积稍大,但这些自动炮为后来被称为氏族标准的产品铺平了道路. 使用LBX10弹药.

content.original: Prototype versions of the Ultra Autocannon all saw limited use with the Clans during Operation KLONDIKE. As with the other weapons of this era, the final evolution of modern ''Clan-spec'' versions would not come until after the conquest of the Pentagon worlds and the dawn of the Golden Century. Uses UAC10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Prototype versions of the Ultra Autocannon all saw limited use with the Clans during Operation KLONDIKE. As with the other weapons of this era, the final evolution of modern ''Clan-spec'' versions would not come until after the conquest of the Pentagon worlds and the dawn of the Golden Century. Uses UAC10 Ammo.
content.content: 在克朗代克行动期间,终极自动炮的原型版本在氏族中的使用都很有限.与这个时代的其他武器一样,现代"氏族规格"版本的演变直到征服五角世界和黄金世纪的黎明后才完成. 使用UAC10弹药.

content.original: Developed by Clan Wolverine during the early years of the Clans, the Enhanced Extended-Range Particle Projector Cannon or Enhanced ER PPC was something of a midway point between the original ER PPC and the eventual Clan model. It had a damage threshold 20% higher than that of the original ER PPC, but the two were otherwise identical.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by Clan Wolverine during the early years of the Clans, the Enhanced Extended-Range Particle Projector Cannon or Enhanced ER PPC was something of a midway point between the original ER PPC and the eventual Clan model. It had a damage threshold 20% higher than that of the original ER PPC, but the two were otherwise identical.
content.content: 由狼獾氏族早期开发的增程型粒子投射加农炮(ER PPC)或增强ER PPC是原始ER PPC和氏族最终版本的一个中间点.它的伤害阈值比最初的ER PPC高20%,但两者在其他方面是相同的.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: Clan technology would scarcely improve the performance of the standard Gauss rifle beyond its Star League-era glory, but the improved version nevertheless demonstrated how Kerensky’s disciples proceeded along that path. Uses Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Clan technology would scarcely improve the performance of the standard Gauss rifle beyond its Star League-era glory, but the improved version nevertheless demonstrated how Kerensky’s disciples proceeded along that path. Uses Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: 氏族技术几乎无法提高标准高斯线膛炮的性能,使其超越星联时期的荣耀,但改进版仍然证明了克伦斯基的弟子是如何沿着这条道路前进的. 使用高斯弹药 不稳定!.

content.original: The improved lasers used by the early Clans included the standard large laser and the large pulse laser. In both cases, engineering and machining refinements rendered these weapons lighter than their forebears, without sacrificing performance.
content.prevOriginal: The improved lasers used by the early Clans included the standard large laser and the large pulse laser. In both cases, engineering and machining refinements rendered these weapons lighter than their forebears, without sacrificing performance.
content.content: 早期氏族使用的改进型激光包括标准大型激光和大型脉冲激光.工程和机甲加工技术的进步使这些武器在不损失性能的情况下比以前更轻.

content.original: A marvel of miniaturization, the Clans reduced the weight of their LRM launchers by half and somewhat reduced their bulk. Further improvements would create the familiar Clan LRM, eliminating the need to swap between engagement ranges
content.prevOriginal: A marvel of miniaturization, the Clans reduced the weight of their LRM launchers by half and somewhat reduced their bulk. Further improvements would create the familiar Clan LRM, eliminating the need to swap between engagement ranges
content.content: 作为一个小型化的奇迹,氏族将其LRM发射器的重量减少了一半,并在一定程度上减少了体积.进一步的改进将创造出熟悉的氏族LRM,无需在预定射程之间切换.

content.original: Advanced laser technologies were among the first to be mastered by the Clans, but during Operation KLONDIKE testing was still underway on the new systems. Experimental versions of the small- and medium-sized versions of the Extended-Range Laser were available during the return to the Pentagon.
content.prevOriginal: Advanced laser technologies were among the first to be mastered by the Clans, but during Operation KLONDIKE testing was still underway on the new systems. Experimental versions of the small- and medium-sized versions of the Extended-Range Laser were available during the return to the Pentagon.
content.content: 先进激光技术是氏族最先掌握的技术之一,但在克朗代克行动期间,新系统的测试仍在进行中.直到返回五角星系期间,才有了可用的中小型激光的实验版本.

content.original: The original Clan Improved PPC eliminates the Minimum range and reduces the size and weight, but sacrifices the EM effect.
content.prevOriginal: The original Clan Improved PPC eliminates the Minimum range and reduces the size and weight, but sacrifices the EM effect.
content.content: 起源氏族改进了粒子炮,消除了最小的射程,减小了尺寸和重量,但牺牲了电磁干扰效果.

content.original: Utilizing more powerful launch mechanisms, the early Clan weapons-makers increased the SRMs’ effective range by one-third, even though launchers themselves remained about the same weight and size as their original counterparts.
content.prevOriginal: Utilizing more powerful launch mechanisms, the early Clan weapons-makers increased the SRMs’ effective range by one-third, even though launchers themselves remained about the same weight and size as their original counterparts.
content.content: 早期的氏族武器制造者使用更强力的发射机制,将SRM的有效射程提高了三分之一,并且发射器本身的重量和尺寸与最初的同类产品大致相同.

content.original: In the final years of the Star League-in-Exile, SLDF researchers and weapons manufacturers attempted to increase the size of the Streak SRM launchers to include four- and six-missile racks. While they had some limited success, the true breakthroughs would not come until the beginning of the Golden Century, when Clan scientists conquered problems with the Streak targeting and guidance systems in the larger rack sizes. Experimental versions of Streak SRM-4 and -6 racks were available in limited quantitiesduring and immediately after Operation KLONDIKE. Uses Streak SRM Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: In the final years of the Star League-in-Exile, SLDF researchers and weapons manufacturers attempted to increase the size of the Streak SRM launchers to include four- and six-missile racks. While they had some limited success, the true breakthroughs would not come until the beginning of the Golden Century, when Clan scientists conquered problems with the Streak targeting and guidance systems in the larger rack sizes. Experimental versions of Streak SRM-4 and -6 racks were available in limited quantitiesduring and immediately after Operation KLONDIKE. Uses Streak SRM Ammo.
content.content: 在星联大出走的最后几年,星联防卫军的研究人员和武器制造者试图增加迅捷SRM发射器的尺寸,以容纳4个或6个导弹.然而他们只取得了一些有限的成果,最后真正的突破要到等到黄金世纪初期,当时氏族的科学家攻克了迅捷SRM的瞄准和制导系统尺寸过大的问题.在克朗代克行动期间,迅捷SRM4和SRM6的实验版本数量非常有限. 使用迅捷SRM弹药/color>.

content.original: Created by the Scientist caste of Clan Snow Raven, Ferro-Lamellor armor is based on the Ferro-Carbide armor used in the Raven's WarShips. Scaled down for use on 'Mechs, AeroSpace Fighters, and tanks, the experimental Ferro-Lamellor armor offers improved protection, beyond even that of the Ferro-Fibrous armor. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Created by the Scientist caste of Clan Snow Raven, Ferro-Lamellor armor is based on the Ferro-Carbide armor used in the Raven's WarShips. Scaled down for use on 'Mechs, AeroSpace Fighters, and tanks, the experimental Ferro-Lamellor armor offers improved protection, beyond even that of the Ferro-Fibrous armor. CASE Enabled
content.content: 纹层钢被雪鸦氏族的科学家创造,以雪鸦氏族战舰上的碳化钢装甲为技术基础.按比例缩小,以便可以在机甲、空天战斗机和坦克上使用,实验性纹层钢改进了防护,性能甚至超越了纤维钢装甲.启用CASE

content.original: Clan Ferro-Fibrous armor (cFF) is a special type of armor used by vehicles and BattleMechs. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Clan Ferro-Fibrous armor (cFF) is a special type of armor used by vehicles and BattleMechs. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle. CASE Enabled
content.content: 氏族纤维钢(cFF)装甲是车辆和战斗机甲使用的特殊类型装甲.使用钢、钛合金和碳纳米管纤维编织而成,提高了装甲板的强度,同等重量下比标准装甲提供了更多的防护,但是占用机甲和车辆的空间也更多.启用CASE

content.original: Originally an Experiment by Clan Jadefalcon, is this 'Glazed' or 'Reflec' armor incorporating advances by the Lyran Alliances Reflective Coating, improving resistance to energy Weapons. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Originally an Experiment by Clan Jadefalcon, is this 'Glazed' or 'Reflec' armor incorporating advances by the Lyran Alliances Reflective Coating, improving resistance to energy Weapons. CASE Enabled
content.content: 起源于碧玉鹰氏族的一项实验,这种'釉面'或'反光'装甲融合了天琴同盟国的先进反射涂层技术,提高了对能量武器的抵抗力. 启用CASE

content.original: Heat-Dissipating Armor is a derivative of the Fire-Resistant Armor used by Clan battlesuits. Created by the Capellan Confederation, it reduces the effects of fire and incendiary weapons on a BattleMech's heat exchange system while intact. Unlike some specialty armors, it is effective against most weapons, but the increased bulk of the armor (from additional insulation and modified sealants) results in less overall protection per ton. The Clan Variant has greater dissipating effects and CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Heat-Dissipating Armor is a derivative of the Fire-Resistant Armor used by Clan battlesuits. Created by the Capellan Confederation, it reduces the effects of fire and incendiary weapons on a BattleMech's heat exchange system while intact. Unlike some specialty armors, it is effective against most weapons, but the increased bulk of the armor (from additional insulation and modified sealants) results in less overall protection per ton. The Clan Variant has greater dissipating effects and CASE Enabled
content.content: 散热装甲是氏族战斗服的使用的耐火装甲的衍生物.由卡佩兰联邦发明,在完好无损的情况下,可以降低开火或燃烧武器对机甲换热系统的影响.和一些特专用装甲不同,它对大多数武器都有效,但装甲体积的增大(来自额外的隔热材料和改进密封剂)导致单位重量下防护能力降低.氏族变体拥有更好的散热效果并且启用CASE

content.original: Clan Heavy Ferro-Fibrous armor (cFF) is a special type of armor used by vehicles and BattleMechs. A derivative of the Ferro Fibrous Research, initially discarded for its increased bulk does it offer superior protection for the same tons. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Clan Heavy Ferro-Fibrous armor (cFF) is a special type of armor used by vehicles and BattleMechs. A derivative of the Ferro Fibrous Research, initially discarded for its increased bulk does it offer superior protection for the same tons. CASE Enabled
content.content: 氏族重型纤维钢装甲(cFF)是一种被车辆和战斗机甲使用的特殊类型装甲.是研究纤维钢时的衍生产品,最初由于体积过大而被放弃,但相同重量下它提供了更好的防护.启用CASE.

content.original: Clan CASE II is functionally similar to the experimental FIS CASE II but only weighs half as much. When an internal explosion occurs, CASE II reduces the damage to the Internal Structure of the installed location to only five points. REQUIRES CLAN ARMOR
content.prevOriginal: Clan CASE II is functionally similar to the experimental FIS CASE II but only weighs half as much. When an internal explosion occurs, CASE II reduces the damage to the Internal Structure of the installed location to only five points. REQUIRES CLAN ARMOR
content.content: 氏族CASE II和实验性FIS CASE II相似,但重量只有前者的一半.当发生内部爆炸时,CASE II将其对内部结构的伤害降低到5点.需要氏族装甲

content.original: Clan version of the Endo-Composite armor originally developed by the Lyrans. The big difference is that it requires two extra slots less. Add exactly 3 Endo-Composite (C) slots to reduce your internal structure weight to 75%.
content.prevOriginal: Clan version of the Endo-Composite armor originally developed by the Lyrans. The big difference is that it requires two extra slots less. Add exactly 3 Endo-Composite (C) slots to reduce your internal structure weight to 75%.
content.content: 氏族版本的复合内构钢最初由天琴座的人发明.最大区别是它降低2槽位占用. 精确的添加3复合内构钢(C)槽位,以使你内部结构重量降低到原本的75%.

content.original: Developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2487 and improved by the Clans after their Exodus, Clan Endo-Steel was designed especially for use in BattleMech skeletons. Using zero-G manufacturing techniques that uniformly mix high-density steel with lower-density titanium and aluminum, the process produces a metal twice as strong per unit of weight as standard skeleton materials, thus halving the weight of the chassis, but at an increase in overall bulk. Reserves 7 Endo-Steel slots to halve your internal structure weight.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2487 and improved by the Clans after their Exodus, Clan Endo-Steel was designed especially for use in BattleMech skeletons. Using zero-G manufacturing techniques that uniformly mix high-density steel with lower-density titanium and aluminum, the process produces a metal twice as strong per unit of weight as standard skeleton materials, thus halving the weight of the chassis, but at an increase in overall bulk. Reserves 7 Endo-Steel slots to halve your internal structure weight.
content.content: 有人类霸权于2487年开发,并在氏族出走后得到改进,氏族内构钢是专门作为战斗机甲骨架设计的.在零重力技术下将高密度钢和低密度的铝和钛均匀混合,单位重量下强度是标准骨架材料的两倍,以使地盘重量减半,但体积增加了. 占用7内构钢槽位,以使你内部结构的重量减半.

content.original: A clan version of the Angel ECM, developed by Clan Goliath Scorpion. Using the benefit of the smaller and more efficient clan technology they managed to shrink its size to the same as a Guardian ECM, but at a much increased cost.
content.prevOriginal: A clan version of the Angel ECM, developed by Clan Goliath Scorpion. Using the benefit of the smaller and more efficient clan technology they managed to shrink its size to the same as a Guardian ECM, but at a much increased cost.
content.content: 天使ECM的氏族版本,由巨人蝎氏族开发.他们利用小而高效的氏族技术的优势,设法将其尺寸缩小到与守护者ECM相同,但成本大大增加.

content.original: The Beagle Active Probe (BAP) is a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry. The Clans never 'lost' the technology, but dispensed with the 'Beagle' surname when they polished the concept.
content.prevOriginal: The Beagle Active Probe (BAP) is a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry. The Clans never 'lost' the technology, but dispensed with the 'Beagle' surname when they polished the concept.
content.content: 猎兔犬主动探测器(BAP)是一套增强技术,当接入通用电子传感器时,装备的单位能够检测和区分除常规步兵外的其他战场单位,无论他们是伪装或关闭.氏族从未'失去'过这项技术,但在完善该概念设备时放弃了'猎兔犬'的名字.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: 降低隐身和ECM护罩单元的效果

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.prevOriginal: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.content: 守护者ECM套件于2597年由人类霸权的约翰斯顿工业公司推出.旨在干扰制导武器、瞄准电脑和通讯系统,守护者通常用发射宽频信号的方法来干扰雷达、红外、紫外、磁扫描和声呐传感器,进而保护盟友免受此类设备的影响.

The Clans never 'lost' the technology, but dispensed with the 'Beagle' surname when they polished the concept.

content.original: Introduced in 2740 by the Terran Hegemony, the Myomer Accelerator Signal Circuitry (MASC) is a piece of equipment that allows a BattleMech to move at twice its walking speed. However, actuators were not built for this kind of stress, and prolonged usage of MASC systems can damage the leg actuators of a BattleMech. Although this is unlikely to immobilize the BattleMech, the danger of destroyed actuators is enough for cautious warriors to limit their use in battle. Activatable: DEALS DAMAGE AND CRIT TO LEGS ON FAILURE
content.prevOriginal: Introduced in 2740 by the Terran Hegemony, the Myomer Accelerator Signal Circuitry (MASC) is a piece of equipment that allows a BattleMech to move at twice its walking speed. Although this is unlikely to immobilize the BattleMech, the danger of destroyed actuators is enough for cautious warriors to limit their use in battle. content.content: 由人类霸权于2740年引入,人工肌肉加速信号电路(MASC)是一种可以让机甲以两倍其普通行走速度移动的装备.然而标准腿部机构不是为这种压力制造的.长时间使用MASC系统可能会损坏机甲腿部机构.虽然这不太可能使机甲瘫痪,但腿部机构被摧毁的危险足以让机甲战士谨慎的在战斗中使用.可激活:失败时对腿部造成伤害和严重损伤.
人工肌肉加速信号电路(MASC)

content.original: The rogue scientists of the Society developed the Nova CEWS after hearing about the C3 Systems used by the Inner Sphere. By combining elements of the Watchdog CEWS with a C3 system, they created a tool that could find enemy forces, hide the unit using it in an ECM bubble, and automatically provide targeting data to other friendly units. In addition, the Nova CEWS didn't require pre-configuration for the C3 capability; It could be programmed on the fly to respond to availability of friendly forces.
content.prevOriginal: The rogue scientists of the Society developed the Nova CEWS after hearing about the C3 Systems used by the Inner Sphere. By combining elements of the Watchdog CEWS with a C3 system, they created a tool that could find enemy forces, hide the unit using it in an ECM bubble, and automatically provide targeting data to other friendly units. In addition, the Nova CEWS didn't require pre-configuration for the C3 capability; It could be programmed on the fly to respond to availability of friendly forces.
content.content: 氏族的科学家听说了内天体使用的C3系统后,开发了超新星(Nova)氏族复合电子战套件(CEWS).通过将看门狗(Watchdog)氏族复合电子战套件(CEWS)和C3系统相结合,他们创造了一种可以找到敌人,在ECM范围内隐藏使用它的单位,并向其他友军单位提供目标数据的工具.此外,超新星CEWS不需要预先拥有C3能力:它可以在运行中编程,以增强友军火力.

content.original: The Extended-Range Micro Laser is a very compact version of conventional ER laser weaponry. This Array Combines 4 Micro ER Laser into one
content.prevOriginal: The Extended-Range Micro Laser is a very compact version of conventional ER laser weaponry. This Array Combines 4 Micro ER Laser into one
content.content: 微型增程激光是传统激光武器的一种非常紧凑的版本.该阵列将4个微型增程激光合成一个

content.original: The Micro Pulse Laser was designed by Clan Smoke Jaguar (alongside the ER Micro Laser) primarily for use on their ProtoMechs. This Array Combines 3 Micro Pulse Laser. It Can fire as a Concentrated Burst, easily melting any armor.
content.prevOriginal: The Micro Pulse Laser was designed by Clan Smoke Jaguar (alongside the ER Micro Laser) primarily for use on their ProtoMechs. This Array Combines 3 Micro Pulse Laser. It Can fire as a Concentrated Burst, easily melting any armor.
content.content: 微型脉冲激光是由烟虎氏族(与微型增程激光一起)设计的,主要用于其原人机甲.该阵列结合了3个微型脉冲激光.它可以集中发射,轻松融化任何装甲.

content.original: Developed by Lubalin Ballistics for the Terran Hegemony, the LB-X Autocannon was a derivative of the standard and relatively primitive Autocannon design. Taking advantage of advanced materials, the company was able to reduce the weight of the weapon for only a slight increase in bulk and mated it with the advanced Mercury-VII targeting system to boost its effective range. Uses LBX10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by Lubalin Ballistics for the Terran Hegemony, the LB-X Autocannon was a derivative of the standard and relatively primitive Autocannon design. Taking advantage of advanced materials, the company was able to reduce the weight of the weapon for only a slight increase in bulk and mated it with the advanced Mercury-VII targeting system to boost its effective range. Uses LBX10 Ammo.
content.content: 由卢巴林弹道公司为人类霸权开发的LB-X自动炮是标准和相对原始的自动炮的衍生品.该公司利用先进材料,仅需稍微稍微增加体积即可减轻武器重量,可以将其与先进水星VII瞄准系统配合,以提高其射程. 使用LBX10弹药.

content.original: One of the most powerful and efficient weapons mounted in combat, AC/10s are known for their heavy damage and ability to stagger opponents. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/10s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire. Uses UAC10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: One of the most powerful and efficient weapons mounted in combat, AC/10s are known for their heavy damage and ability to stagger opponents. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/10s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire. Uses UAC10 Ammo.
content.content: UAC/10是战斗中最强大、最高效的武器之一,以其强大的伤害和击倒对手的能力而闻名. 与所有自动火炮武器一样,UAC/10也会受到连射后座力的影响. 使用UAC10弹药.

content.original: The king of the battlefield in terms of raw damage, AC/20s hit harder than any other weapon. However, this comes at the expense of weight, range, and severely limited ammunition. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/20s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire. Uses UAC20 Ammo.

content.content: 就基础伤害而言,UAC/20是战场之王,它比其他的任何武器都更具杀伤力.然而,这是以重量、射程和严重受限的弹药为代价.与所有自动加农炮武器一样,UAC20在连续射击后也会受后座力影响. 使用UAC20弹药

content.content: 由卢巴林弹道公司为人类霸权开发的LB-X自动炮是标准和相对原始的自动炮的衍生品.该公司利用先进材料,仅需稍微稍微增加体积即可减轻武器重量,可以将其与先进水星VII瞄准系统配合,以提高其射程. 使用LBX5弹药.

content.original: Ultra Autocannons boast double the rate of fire of a regular Autocannon, with only moderate increases in weight, size, and heat. The UAC/5 is a reliable long range weapon. Uses UAC5 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Ultra Autocannons boast double the rate of fire of a regular Autocannon, with only moderate increases in weight, size, and heat. The UAC/5 is a reliable long range weapon. Uses UAC5 Ammo.
content.content: 终极自动炮的射速是普通自动炮的两倍,重量、体积和热量只是适度增加.UAC5定位为远程武器. 使用UAC5弹药

content.original: The Extended Range Flamer (or ER Flamer) is a longer-range, weaker version of the fusion-based Flamer. First developed by Clan Jade Falcon and introduced to the Inner Sphere by the Federated Suns, the Extended Range Flamer uses tighter magnetic coils and a narrower muzzle diameter to increase the weapon's range.
content.prevOriginal: The Extended Range Flamer (or ER Flamer) is a longer-range, weaker version of the fusion-based Flamer. First developed by Clan Jade Falcon and introduced to the Inner Sphere by the Federated Suns, the Extended Range Flamer uses tighter magnetic coils and a narrower muzzle diameter to increase the weapon's range.
content.content: 增程喷火器(ER 喷火器)是一种射程更远的,威力更弱的聚变喷火器.由碧玉鹰氏族开发,并由恒星联邦引入到内天体,增程喷火器使用更紧密的磁线圈和更窄的枪口直径来增加武器的射程.

content.original: Flamer weapons are unique in that they deal little physical damage but instead expel superheated plasma, applying substantial heat to their target. When done properly, this can hamper enemy return fire or even cause the targeted unit to shut down from overheating.
content.prevOriginal: Flamer weapons are unique in that they deal little physical damage but instead expel superheated plasma, applying substantial heat to their target. When done properly, this can hamper enemy return fire or even cause the targeted unit to shut down from overheating.
content.content: 喷火器的独特之处在于,它不造成物理伤害,而是排出过热的等离子体,增加目标大量热量.如果操作得当,这可以阻止敌人的回击,甚至让目标单位因过热而停机.

content.original: The Heavy Flamer was developed by Clan Jade Falcon after encountering large infantry formations during Operation Revival. Heavier, yet smaller then the old Vehicle Heavy Flamer, does it provide minor improvements at range and against overheating targets. Uses Heavy Flamer Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Heavy Flamer was developed by Clan Jade Falcon after encountering large infantry formations during Operation Revival. content.content: 重型喷火器是由碧玉鹰氏族在复兴行动中遇到大型步兵编队后开发的.它比旧的车载型喷火器更重,但体积更小,在射程和让目标过热方面也有轻微改进. 使用重型喷火器弹药.

content.original: A Gauss Rifle uses electromagnetic charges to accelerate metallic rounds at extremely high speed, dealing massive damage by kinetic force alone. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: A Gauss Rifle uses electromagnetic charges to accelerate metallic rounds at extremely high speed, dealing massive damage by kinetic force alone. VOLATILE!
content.content: 高斯线膛炮使用电磁电荷以极高的速度发射金属子弹,单靠动能造成巨大的伤害.不稳定!

content.original: The Hyper-Assault Gauss Rifle is a variation on the Gauss Rifle developed by Clan Hell's Horses. Hoping to stay ahead of the increasing technological curve, they used similar design principles to the Heavy Gauss Rifle, however, Horse scientists used a series of capacitors and launching tubes to fire a multitude of smaller-caliber slugs. Uses Hyper Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!

content.original: Clan Star Adder developed the Heavy Lasers to deal more damage, but with an increased heat output. In addition, interference with a BattleMech's sensors means that a Heavy Large Laser is penalized with a +1 to-hit modifier.
content.prevOriginal: Clan Star Adder developed the Heavy Lasers to deal more damage, but with an increased heat output. In addition, interference with a BattleMech's sensors means that a Heavy Large Laser is penalized with a +1 to-hit modifier.

content.original: After the Star Adders introduced their Heavy Lasers, the other Clans started projects to duplicate or improve on them. Clan Goliath Scorpion was the first clan to introduce an effective Improved Heavy Laser, but it still possessed several tradeoffs that some warriors wouldn't accept. Most notable of these, it could explode if it suffered critical damage, much like a Gauss Rifle.

Clan Goliath Scorpion was the first clan to introduce an effective Improved Heavy Laser, but it still possessed several tradeoffs that some warriors wouldn't accept. Most notable of these, it could explode if it suffered critical damage, much like a Gauss Rifle.

content.original: The technicians of Clan Wolf were interested in creating an improved pulse laser with extended range. Unlike their Inner Sphere counterparts, who simply pumped more energy into a standard pulse laser, the Wolf techs combined the best features of their Pulse and Extended range lasers to create the ER Pulse Laser family.

content.content: 狼氏族的技术人员对创造一种具有更远射程的改进脉冲激光很感兴趣.和他们只是将更多的能量注入标准脉冲激光中的内天体同行不同,狼氏族技术人员将其脉冲和增程激光的最佳特性结合起来,创造了增程脉冲激光系列.

content.original: An improvement upon standard Large Lasers, Extended-Range Large Lasers extend their effective range at the cost of massive heat generation.
content.prevOriginal: An improvement upon standard Large Lasers, Extended-Range Large Lasers extend their effective range at the cost of massive heat generation.
content.content: 对标准大型激光器的改进,以大量发热为代价增程激光器拓展了他们的有效射程.

content.original: An improvement upon standard Large Lasers, Large Pulse Lasers use pulses of light instead of a single beam. This results in better accuracy and damage output but with greatly increased heat and weight.
content.prevOriginal: An improvement upon standard Large Lasers, Large Pulse Lasers use pulses of light instead of a single beam. This results in better accuracy and damage output but with greatly increased heat and weight.
content.content: 对标准激光的改进,大型脉冲激光使用光脉冲而不是单光束.这获得了更好的精度和更强的破坏,但热量和重量也大大增加了.

content.original: Chemical Lasers are not exactly a new invention but a rediscovering of Pre FTL Terra Laser Weapons that relied on a Chemical Process to create the required Energy output for a successful Shot. Uses Chem Large Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Chemical Lasers are not exactly a new invention but a rediscovering of Pre FTL Terra Laser Weapons that relied on a Chemical Process to create the required Energy output for a successful Shot. Uses Chem Large Ammo.

content.original: While lost to the Inner Sphere during the devastation of the Succession Wars, the Clans retained the Target Acquisition Gear, but rarely made use of them due to their culture's focus on personal glory rather than supporting roles.

content.original: The LRM10 rack of Long-Range Missiles occupies a supporting fire role when mounted on most units, with fairly low damage balanced by low heat and ammunition consumption. Like all LRMs, LRM10s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Uses LRM [CLAN] Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The LRM10 rack of Long-Range Missiles occupies a supporting fire role when mounted on most units, with fairly low damage balanced by low heat and ammunition consumption. Like all LRMs, LRM10s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Uses LRM [CLAN] Ammo.
content.content: 远程导弹发射器(LRM)10安装在大多数单位上时起到了辅助火力作用,通过低热耗和弹药消耗来平衡相当低的伤害.与所有LRM一样,LRM10能够在侦察单位帮助下越过障碍物和地形间瞄射击.LRM可以通过使用专用弹药担任多种角色. 使用氏族LRM弹药.

content.original: The Streak LRM marries the Streak guidance system with a standard LRM launcher. Developed by Clan Coyote technicians as part of Khan Sullivan Koga's revitalization plan, the Streak LRM combines the orignial Streak's ammunition conservation with LRM range. Though successful, the Streak LRM launcher weighs twice as much as the standard Clan LRM launcher (as much as a standard Inner Sphere launcher). The Streak LRM cannot make use of any alternate ammunition types or enhanced guidance systems. Since the Streak LRM requires line of sight to lock on to a target it also lost the ability to make indirect fire attacks. Uses Streak LRM Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Streak LRM marries the Streak guidance system with a standard LRM launcher. Developed by Clan Coyote technicians as part of Khan Sullivan Koga's revitalization plan, the Streak LRM combines the orignial Streak's ammunition conservation with LRM range. Though successful, the Streak LRM launcher weighs twice as much as the standard Clan LRM launcher (as much as a standard Inner Sphere launcher). The Streak LRM cannot make use of any alternate ammunition types or enhanced guidance systems. Since the Streak LRM requires line of sight to lock on to a target it also lost the ability to make indirect fire attacks. Uses Streak LRM Ammo.
content.content: 迅捷(Streak)LRM将迅捷制导系统与标准LRM发射器结合在一起.迅捷LRM由狼氏族技术人员开发,作为沙利文·科加可汗的振兴计划的一部分,将原始的迅捷弹药与LRM射程相结合.尽管成功了,但迅捷LRM的重量是氏族标准LRM的两倍(相当于一个内天体标准发射器).迅捷LRM不能使用任何替代弹药类型或增强制导系统.由于迅捷LRM需要视线来锁定目标,因此它失去了任何间瞄射击的能力. 使用迅捷LRM弹药.

content.original: LRM15 Long-Range Missile racks deal substantial damage and stability impact over distance, often found in pairs on indirect-fire support units. Like all LRMs, LRM15s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Uses LRM [CLAN] Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: LRM15 Long-Range Missile racks deal substantial damage and stability impact over distance, often found in pairs on indirect-fire support units. Like all LRMs, LRM15s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Uses LRM [CLAN] Ammo.
content.content: LRM15远程导弹(LRM)架在远距射程上造成巨大的破坏和稳定性影响,通常成对出现在间接火力支援单位上.与所有LRM一样,LRM15能够在侦察单位帮助下越过障碍物和地形间瞄射击.LRM可以通过使用专用弹药担任多种角色. 使用氏族LRM弹药.

content.original: Often found as the secondary weapon on heavier units, LRM20 racks of Long-Range Missiles can deal decent damage while a unit closes range, but they chew through ammunition. Like all LRMs, LRM20s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Uses LRM [CLAN] Ammo.

content.original: The smallest rack of Long-Range Missiles, LRM5s are efficient and tend to serve as harassment weapons. Like all LRMs, LRM5s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Uses LRM [CLAN] Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The smallest rack of Long-Range Missiles, LRM5s are efficient and tend to serve as harassment weapons. Like all LRMs, LRM5s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Uses LRM [CLAN] Ammo.
content.content: LRM5是远程导弹中最小的一种,效率很高,往往用作骚扰武器.与所有LRM一样,LRM5能够在侦察单位帮助下越过障碍物和地形间瞄射击.LRM可以通过使用专用弹药担任多种角色. 使用氏族LRM弹药.

content.original: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 4 Machine Guns. Clan Versions are less likely to Jam at higher fire rates. Uses MG Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 4 Machine Guns. Clan Versions are less likely to Jam at higher fire rates. Uses MG Ammo.
content.content: 机枪阵列是多支机枪连接在一起同时开火,由4支机枪组成.氏族版本在更高的开火频率下也不容易卡壳. 使用机枪弹药.

content.original: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 3 Heavy Machine Guns. Clan Versions are less likely to Jam at higher fire rates. Uses HMG Ammo. Left Click on Ammocount/Damage value during battle to switch firing mode
content.prevOriginal: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 3 Heavy Machine Guns. Clan Versions are less likely to Jam at higher fire rates. Uses HMG Ammo. Left Click on Ammocount/Damage value during battle to switch firing mode
content.content: 机枪阵列是多支机枪连接在一起同时开火,由3支重机枪组成.氏族版本在更高的开火频率下也不容易卡壳. 使用重机枪弹药 左键点击 数量/伤害 以切换射击模式

content.original: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 4 Light Machine Guns. Clan Versions are less likely to Jam at higher fire rates. Uses LMG Ammo. Left Click on Ammocount/Damage value during battle to switch firing mode
content.prevOriginal: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 4 Light Machine Guns. Clan Versions are less likely to Jam at higher fire rates. Uses LMG Ammo. Left Click on Ammocount/Damage value during battle to switch firing mode
content.content: 机枪阵列是多支机枪连接在一起同时开火,由4支轻机枪组成.氏族版本在更高的开火频率下也不容易卡壳. 使用轻机枪弹药 左键点击 数量/伤害 以切换射击模式

content.original: As its name implies, the Heavy Machine Gun is less a Machine Gun and more like an automated Grenade Launcher. The HMG does more damage and has a better chance of penetrating and destroying critical components, but weighs twice as much, and suffers from recoil. Uses HMG Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: As its name implies, the Heavy Machine Gun is less a Machine Gun and more like an automated Grenade Launcher. The HMG does more damage and has a better chance of penetrating and destroying critical components, but weighs twice as much, and suffers from recoil. Uses HMG Ammo.
content.content: 顾名思义,重机枪(HMG)与其说是机枪(MG),不如说是自动榴弹发射器.重机枪造成的伤害更大,穿透和摧毁关键部件的机会更大,但重量是普通机枪的两倍,并且存在后座问题. 使用重机枪弹药.

content.original: The Light Machine Gun fires smaller caliber shells, but boasts a higher rate of fire and increased range over a standard Machine Gun. Uses LMG Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Light Machine Gun fires smaller caliber shells, but boasts a higher rate of fire and increased range over a standard Machine Gun. Uses LMG Ammo.
content.content: 轻机枪发射小口径炮弹,但拥有比标准机枪更高的射速和更大的射程. 使用轻机枪弹药.

content.original: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. Uses MG Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. Uses MG Ammo.
content.content: 机枪(MG)造成的伤害非常低,射程非常有限,并且依赖于不稳定的弹药. 使用机枪弹药.

content.original: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. This one is just two welded together to operate off a single hardpoint. Uses MG Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. This one is just two welded together to operate off a single hardpoint. Uses MG Ammo.
content.content: 机枪(MG)造成的伤害非常低,射程非常有限,并且依赖于不稳定的弹药.这个只是将两个普通机枪焊接在一起,只占用一个挂载点. 使用机枪弹药.

content.original: Based on the weapon used by infantry for centuries, the Mech Mortar fires a small shell in a high arc that falls onto the target. Though the Mech Mortar was created by the Terran Hegemony, by 2835 the Succession Wars had relegated it to history. With the reintroduction of the Anti-Missile System, engineers revived the Mech Mortar concept. The munitions used by the mortars, though often possessing limited guidance packages, weren't destroyed by AMS systems in tests. Mortar shells also proved very adaptable, accepting several types of payloads. Uses Mortar Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Based on the weapon used by infantry for centuries, the Mech Mortar fires a small shell in a high arc that falls onto the target. Though the Mech Mortar was created by the Terran Hegemony, by 2835 the Succession Wars had relegated it to history. With the reintroduction of the Anti-Missile System, engineers revived the Mech Mortar concept. The munitions used by the mortars, though often possessing limited guidance packages, weren't destroyed by AMS systems in tests. Mortar shells also proved very adaptable, accepting several types of payloads. Uses Mortar Ammo.
content.content: 基于步兵几个世纪以来使用的武器,机甲迫击炮能够以高弧度发射一枚小炮弹落在目标上. 虽然机甲迫击炮是人类霸权发明的,但到了2835年,继承战争已将其变为历史.随着反导系统的重新引入,工程师们重新提出了机甲迫击炮的概念.迫击炮使用的弹药,尽管通常是有限制导,但在测试中没有被AMS系统摧毁.迫击炮的弹药适应性也很强,可以使用多种类型弹药. 使用迫击炮弹药

content.content: 基于步兵几个世纪以来使用的武器,机甲迫击炮能够以高弧度发射一枚小炮弹落在目标上. 虽然机甲迫击炮是人类霸权发明的,但到了2835年,继承战争已将其变为历史.随着反导系统的重新引入,工程师们重新提出了机甲迫击炮的概念.迫击炮使用的弹药,尽管通常是有限制导,但在测试中没有被AMS系统摧毁.迫击炮的弹药适应性也很强,可以使用多种类型弹药. 使用迫击炮弹药

content.original: This Plasma Cannon accelerates and superheats a cartridge of 'plastic foam' into an excited state and release it as plasma, creating a tremendous kinetic and thermal impact. Unlike the Capellan version, the Clan Scientists focused exclusively on heat generation, making the Plasma Cannon cause nearly twice as much heat damage on the target. VOLATILE! Uses Plasma Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: This Plasma Cannon accelerates and superheats a cartridge of 'plastic foam' into an excited state and release it as plasma, creating a tremendous kinetic and thermal impact. Unlike the Capellan version, the Clan Scientists focused exclusively on heat generation, making the Plasma Cannon cause nearly twice as much heat damage on the target. VOLATILE! Uses Plasma Ammo.
content.content: 这个等离子加农炮将一个"等离子泡沫"弹药加速并加热到激发态,将其转换为等离子体发射,产生巨大的动能和热冲击.和卡佩兰版本不同,氏族科学家专注于热效应,使等离子炮对目标造成的热伤害几乎是卡佩兰版本的两倍.不稳定! 使用等离子弹药

content.original: High energy residue reduces heat efficiency by 20%.
content.prevOriginal: High energy residue reduces heat efficiency by 20%.

content.original: ER PPC combined with a PPC capcitator. Enabling the capacitator increases damage but also heat generated considerably.
content.prevOriginal: ER PPC combined with a PPC capcitator. Enabling the capacitator increases damage but also heat generated considerably.
content.content: 结合了电容器的增程粒子炮.启用电容器可以增加伤害,但也会产生巨量的热量.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: An improvement upon standard PPCs, Extended-Range PPCs greatly extend their effective range at the cost of incredible heat generation. ER PPCs also generate a mild EM field that degrades the firing capability of their target.
content.prevOriginal: An improvement upon standard PPCs, Extended-Range PPCs greatly extend their effective range at the cost of incredible heat generation. ER PPCs also generate a mild EM field that degrades the firing capability of their target.
content.content: 作为对标准粒子炮的改进,增程粒子炮以难以置信的发热为代价,极大的拓展了其有效射程.增程粒子炮还产生了轻微的电磁场,降低了其攻击目标的瞄准能力.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: The Rotary Autocannon is based only loosely on the Autocannon. While it has the same bore, it is capable of firing up to six times as many rounds as its standard cousin, allowing it to deal three times the damage of even an Ultra Autocannon. At the same time, each extra shot increases the amount of heat the autocannon builds and increases the chance for a jam. The Clan Variant sports increased range at the cost of increased size. Uses RAC2 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Rotary Autocannon is based only loosely on the Autocannon. While it has the same bore, it is capable of firing up to six times as many rounds as its standard cousin, allowing it to deal three times the damage of even an Ultra Autocannon. At the same time, each extra shot increases the amount of heat the autocannon builds and increases the chance for a jam. The Clan Variant sports increased range at the cost of increased size. Uses RAC2 Ammo.
content.content: 转轮式自动炮(RAC)仅在一定程度上基于自动炮.虽然它们有相同的口径,但其发射能力是其标准同类的六倍,使其造成的伤害甚至是终极自动炮的三倍.同时,发射每增加一次,自动炮产生的热量也会增加,并增加发生卡壳的可能性.氏族变体以增加体积为代价增加了射程. 使用RAC2弹药.

content.original: The Rotary Autocannon is based only loosely on the Autocannon. While it has the same bore, it is capable of firing up to six times as many rounds as its standard cousin, allowing it to deal three times the damage of even an Ultra Autocannon. At the same time, each extra shot increases the amount of heat the autocannon builds and increases the chance for a jam. Like Ultra autocannons, Rotary autocannons are unable to make use of special munitions. The Clan Variant sports increased range at the cost of increased size. Uses RAC5 Ammo.

content.original: A tiny rack of Short-Range Missiles, SRM2s deal little damage but also cost almost nothing in the way of weight, space, heat, or ammunition consumption. As for all SRMs, SRM2 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons. Uses SRM [CLAN] Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: A tiny rack of Short-Range Missiles, SRM2s deal little damage but also cost almost nothing in the way of weight, space, heat, or ammunition consumption. As for all SRMs, SRM2 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons. Uses SRM [CLAN] Ammo.
content.content: SRM2是一种小型的短程导弹发射器,造成伤害很小,但在重量、空间、热量或弹药消耗方面几乎不需要任何成本.与其他武器相比,所有SRM2射击的命中率高于平均水平. 使用氏族近程导弹弹药

content.original: The Streak SRM-2 launcher is a prototype SRM that uses an advanced active guidance system to track targets, but at the cost of increased weight and heat generation. Uses Clan Streak SRM Ammo.

As for all SRMs, SRM4 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons. Uses SRM [CLAN] Ammo.

content.prevOriginal: This Launcher fires a single NARC beacon that attaches itself to the enemy and emits a homing signal for all friendly weapons.
